summary: Food ordering app with a full menu page featuring 11 categories. The Order tab is currently not working.
known_issues: Order tab is not responding/not working when clicked

existing_features.title: Fix the Order tab in the bottom navigation bar so that clicking it successfully navigates to the Order/order-taking page. Ensure the active route highlight works correctly for the /order route and that the tab responds to user interaction without errors.

projectName: Fix Order tab navigation not responding
